Text: furn quoteSir or Madam Thank you for your interest in Cayton Furniture After reviewing your information we realized there was insufficient details for our company to suggest the proper quotes In order to receive a quote on any type of furniture we carry we will need the manufacturers name and the furniture manufacturer number If you are inquiring about some piece of upholstery such as a sofa or loveseat we will also need the grade of the fabric We will be happy to respond to your email once this information is given Once again thank you for your business Sales Assistant Cayton Furniture
